post.text: VOTERS, not special interests, WILL BE IN CHARGE. -DJT

comment.author: Michael
comment.text: As the 3rd party for South Korea, I have been watching and searching this US election carefully. Most Korea media have very very negative comment and article about Donald Trump and they are distorting and describing that Trump is a very evil miser.

replies.author: Rasha
replies.text: Do they give detail or example?
